DOC.brief_summary: The goal compare quality post-cesarean analgesia , side effect incidence residual scar pain obtain intrathecal morphine ( reference treatment ) continuous intra-wound solution include ropivacain diclofenac ( experimental treatment ) .
DOC.brief_title: Post-cesarean Pain Control Via Continuous Infusion Ropivacain et Diclogenac Into Wound Versus Intathecal Morphine
